title: Tejarah Talks discusses Oman's journey to Net-Zero target - Times Of Oman
summary: Oman is committed to achieving Net Zero by 2050 and the transition to a green economy presents new commercial opportunities for Omani businesses.  The country is already home to several large renewable energy initiatives, and is also developing green hydrogen and carbon capture technologies. The Tejarah Talks session “Oman’s Journey to Net-Zero: An Environment for Enterprise?” will provide a platform for Omani businesses of all sizes to learn more about the latest developments in sustainable practices and climate-related regulations.

title: Top 10 Best Agricultural Chemicals Companies In India In 2023 - Inventiva
summary: Green innovation is an innovation that contributes to environmental sustainability goals, such as decarbonisation, reducing or replacing harmful substances, reducing resource consumption by developing a circular economy, nature and wildlife conservation, or the protection of biological systems. Business innovation is defined as a new or improved product or business process that differs significantly from the firm's previous products or business processes and that has been introduced on the market or brought into use by the firm. A green product can be defined comprehensively as any good or service that is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle. A green process refers to a method or technique in manufacturing, production, or any other operational activity that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability.
